sql-script.name: case
sql-script.tran-sql:
prj_custom
create table prj_nav ( id bigint not null, title varchar(64) not null, url varchar(128) not null, image varchar(64) not null, oorder bigint not null, primary key(id) );

prj_custom
create table prj_custom ( id bigint not null, name varchar(64) not null, type varchar(64) not null, value text, primary key(id), unique (type, name) );
insert into prj_custom(id,name,type,value) values(0,'company_name','company','智汇企业门户系统');
insert into prj_custom(id,name,type,value) values(20,'site_name','site','智汇企业门户系统');
insert into prj_custom(id,name,type,value) values(22,'site_keywords','site','企业，建站，企业门户，免费CMS');
insert into prj_custom(id,name,type,value) values(23,'site_desc','site','是一个免费的门户系统');
